title: Selene - Among the Frozen (2013 Symphonic Metal)
description:
--------Track Listing-------

1. Peace of Mind (04:55)
2. 'Til the Shadows (04:28)
3. End of It All (03:33)
4. Ghost (02:52)
5. The Codex (04:04)
6. Rain (04:10)

---------Personel----------

Shonagh Lyons - Vocals
John Connor - Music & Lyrics, (additional Vocals on Track 3)

"Among the Frozen" was Mixed and Mastered by John Connor at Studio XIII, L/Derry

www.selene-theband.co.uk

-----------Bio--------------

Selene is a fresh new Symphonic Metal band from L/Derry in Northern Ireland. 
Bringing together a mix of soaring Operatic vocals, infectious hooks and hard 
hitting metal they bring forward a signature Symphonic Metal sound without 
losing the Metal Edge.

Selene was founded in 2013 by John Connor and Shonagh Lyons. Having previously 
worked together in Gate XIII when Shonagh performed vocals on one track of 
their 2012 EP Once Upon a Time and acted as Lead vocalist in the following live 
shows, they decided to start a band playing Symphonic Metal that would fit well 
in a live environment. 

They quickly finished their first EP Ã¢â‚¬Å“Among the FrozenÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ which was released 
July 16th 2013. Ã¢â‚¬Å“Among the FrozenÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ has already been seeing good success with 
a number of tracks receiving airplay both internationally and locally with 
coverage of the release coming from all corners of the world drawing favourable 
comparisons with bands such as Nightwish, Sonata Arctica, and Evanescance
